EntitySet.sap:label: Projection View for PO based Invoice

EntitySet.Name: ZP_AISP_POVIM_HEAD_Submitted
EntitySet.sap:label: Projection View for PO based Invoice

EntitySet.Name: ZP_AISP_POVIM_HEAD
EntitySet.sap:label: Projection View for PO based Invoice

Property.Name: Ebeln
Property.sap:label: Purchase Order Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: Unique identifier of the Purchase Order linked to this record

Property.Name: Vbeln
Property.sap:label: Inbound Delivery
Property.sap:quickinfo: Inbound delivery document number associated with the PO

Property.Name: Mblnr
Property.sap:label: Material Document Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: Material document generated for goods movement postings

Property.Name: Bukrs
Property.sap:label: Company Code
Property.sap:quickinfo: Legal entity (company code) responsible for the document

Property.Name: Bedat
Property.sap:label: Document Date
Property.sap:quickinfo: Date on which the document was created/issued

Property.Name: Bstyp
Property.sap:label: Document Type
Property.sap:quickinfo: Type of purchasing document (e.g., Standard, Subcontracting)

Property.Name: Bsart
Property.sap:label: Purchase Order Type
Property.sap:quickinfo: Category of purchase order (e.g., NB – Standard PO)

Property.Name: Loekz
Property.sap:label: Deletion Flag
Property.sap:quickinfo: Indicates whether the document or item is marked for deletion

Property.Name: Statu
Property.sap:quickinfo: Overall processing status of the document

Property.Name: Aedat
Property.sap:label: Last Change Date (Technical)
Property.sap:quickinfo: Technical date of last change to the document

Property.Name: Ernam
Property.sap:label: Created By
Property.sap:quickinfo: User ID of the person who created the document

Property.Name: LastChangeDate
Property.sap:label: Last Changed Date
Property.sap:quickinfo: Business-readable last changed date (if different from Aedat)

Property.Name: Pincr
Property.sap:label: Purchasing Document Increment
Property.sap:quickinfo: Internal increment/counter for the purchasing document

Property.Name: Lponr
Property.sap:label: Purchase Order Item
Property.sap:quickinfo: Item number within the purchase order

Property.Name: ASNamount
Property.sap:label: ASN Amount
Property.sap:quickinfo: Total amount associated with the advance shipping notice

Property.Name: AsnDate
Property.sap:label: ASN Date
Property.sap:quickinfo: Date when the advance shipping notice was created/sent

Property.Name: Zterm
Property.sap:label: Payment Term
Property.sap:quickinfo: Payment terms (e.g., due days, cash discount)

Property.Name: Zbd1t
Property.sap:label: Discount Days 1
Property.sap:quickinfo: Number of days for the first cash discount period

Property.Name: Zbd2t
Property.sap:label: Discount Days 2
Property.sap:quickinfo: Number of days for the second cash discount period

Property.Name: Zbd3t
Property.sap:label: Discount Days 3
Property.sap:quickinfo: Number of days for the third cash discount period

Property.Name: Zbd1p
Property.sap:label: Discount Percent 1
Property.sap:quickinfo: Cash discount percentage for the first period

Property.Name: Zbd2p
Property.sap:label: Discount Percent 2
Property.sap:quickinfo: Cash discount percentage for the second period

Property.Name: Ekgrp
Property.sap:label: Purchasing Group
Property.sap:quickinfo: Buyer / buying group responsible for this document

Property.Name: Kufix
Property.sap:label: Fixed Exchange Rate
Property.sap:quickinfo: Indicates a fixed currency/exchange rate is applied

Property.Name: Bwbdt
Property.sap:label: Planned Delivery Date
Property.sap:quickinfo: Planned date for delivery of goods/services

Property.Name: Bnddt
Property.sap:label: Binding Date
Property.sap:quickinfo: Date until which an offer/commitment remains binding

Property.Name: Gwldt
Property.sap:label: Goods Receipt Date
Property.sap:quickinfo: Date on which the goods receipt was posted

Property.Name: Ausnr
Property.sap:label: Reference PO Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: Related or preceding purchase order number

Property.Name: Ihrez
Property.sap:label: Deliveries Pending
Property.sap:quickinfo: Outstanding deliveries yet to be received

Property.Name: Llief
Property.sap:label: Vendor Code (Alt.)
Property.sap:quickinfo: Alternate vendor code used in processes

Property.Name: Autlf
Property.sap:label: Automatic Delivery Flag
Property.sap:quickinfo: Indicates whether automatic delivery is allowed

Property.Name: Weakt
Property.sap:label: Active Indicator
Property.sap:quickinfo: Marks whether the record is currently active

Property.Name: TotalAmount
Property.sap:label: Total Amount
Property.sap:quickinfo: Total value of the document in document currency

Property.Name: APPROVED_COMMENT
Property.sap:label: Approval Comment
Property.sap:quickinfo: Remarks recorded by approvers when approving

Property.Name: CREATED_ON
Property.sap:label: Created On
Property.sap:quickinfo: Timestamp when the record was created

Property.Name: LAST_UPDATED_ON
Property.sap:label: Last Updated On
Property.sap:quickinfo: Timestamp of the most recent update

Property.Name: PROCESS_LEVEL
Property.sap:label: Process Level
Property.sap:quickinfo: Current level/stage in the business workflow

Property.Name: Invoicerefno
Property.sap:label: Invoice Reference Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: External invoice reference linked to this process

Property.Name: Invoicedate
Property.sap:label: Invoice Date
Property.sap:quickinfo: Date printed or recorded on the invoice

Property.Name: APPROVER_ROLE
Property.sap:label: Approver Role
Property.sap:quickinfo: Role responsible for the current approval step

Property.Name: APPROVER_LEVEL
Property.sap:label: Approver Level
Property.sap:quickinfo: Numeric level of the approver in the workflow

Property.Name: CURRENT_ASSIGNEE
Property.sap:label: Current Assignee
Property.sap:quickinfo: User currently assigned to act on the item

Property.Name: COMPANY_CODE
Property.sap:label: Company Code (Display)
Property.sap:quickinfo: Display copy of the company code for UI/use cases

Property.Name: MAX_APPROVER_LEVEL
Property.sap:label: Max Approver Level
Property.sap:quickinfo: Highest approver level configured for this workflow

Property.Name: REQUEST_NO
Property.sap:label: Request Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: Internal request identifier for this process

Property.Name: supplierInvoiceRefNo
Property.sap:label: Invoice ref no
Property.sap:quickinfo: Respponse from s4 invoice ref no

NavigationProperty.Name: TO_VIM_ITEMS
NavigationProperty.sap:label: VIM Items
NavigationProperty.sap:quickinfo: Association to all VIM items belonging to this request

Property.Name: Ebeln
Property.sap:label: Purchase Order Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: Unique identifier of the Purchase Order

Property.Name: Vbeln
Property.sap:label: Inbound Delivery
Property.sap:quickinfo: Inbound delivery document number linked to the PO

Property.Name: Ebelp
Property.sap:label: Purchase Order Item
Property.sap:quickinfo: Item number within the Purchase Order

Property.Name: Txz01
Property.sap:label: Short Text Description
Property.sap:quickinfo: Brief description of the item or material

Property.Name: Ebtyp
Property.sap:label: ASN Type
Property.sap:quickinfo: Type/category of the Advance Shipping Notification

Property.Name: Eindt
Property.sap:label: Expected Delivery Date
Property.sap:quickinfo: Planned delivery date for the item

Property.Name: Erdat
Property.sap:label: Document Date
Property.sap:quickinfo: Date when the document was created

Property.Name: Ezeit
Property.sap:label: Delivery Time
Property.sap:quickinfo: Time when the delivery was recorded

Property.Name: ASNitAmount
Property.sap:label: ASN Item Amount
Property.sap:quickinfo: Amount for the item in the ASN

Property.Name: GRNitAmount
Property.sap:label: Goods Receipt ASN Amount
Property.sap:quickinfo: Amount recorded in the goods receipt for the ASN item

Property.Name: Taxper
Property.sap:label: Tax Percentage
Property.sap:quickinfo: Tax percentage applied to the item

Property.Name: Taxval
Property.sap:label: Tax Value
Property.sap:quickinfo: Tax value calculated for the item

Property.Name: Total
Property.sap:label: Total Amount
Property.sap:quickinfo: Total amount including taxes for the item

Property.Name: Meins
Property.sap:label: Unit of Measure
Property.sap:quickinfo: Measurement unit for the quantity (e.g., EA, KG, L)

Property.Name: Estkz
Property.sap:label: Stock Type
Property.sap:quickinfo: Type of stock (e.g., unrestricted, quality, blocked)

Property.Name: Loekz
Property.sap:label: Deletion Flag
Property.sap:quickinfo: Indicates whether the item is flagged for deletion

Property.Name: Kzdis
Property.sap:label: Discount Flag
Property.sap:quickinfo: Indicates whether discounts are applied to the item

Property.Name: Xblnr
Property.sap:label: Reference Document Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: Reference to another document (e.g., invoice, shipment)

Property.Name: Vbelp
Property.sap:label: Inbound Delivery Item
Property.sap:quickinfo: Item number within the inbound delivery

Property.Name: REQUEST_NO
Property.sap:label: Request Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: Internal request identifier linked to this item

Property.Name: Invoicerefno
Property.sap:label: Invoice Reference Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: Reference number of the linked invoice

Property.Name: VendorCode
Property.sap:label: Vendor Code
Property.sap:quickinfo: Unique code assigned to the vendor

Property.Name: REQUEST_NO
Property.sap:label: Request Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: Internal request identifier linked to the attachment

Property.Name: DESCRIPTION
Property.sap:quickinfo: Brief description of the attachment content

Property.Name: IMAGEURL
Property.sap:label: Image URL
Property.sap:quickinfo: URL location where the attachment image is stored

Property.Name: IMAGE_FILE_NAME
Property.sap:label: Image File Name
Property.sap:quickinfo: Original file name of the uploaded image

Property.Name: COMMENT
Property.sap:quickinfo: Additional remarks or notes related to the attachment

Property.Name: STATUS
Property.sap:quickinfo: Current status of the attachment (e.g., Active, Inactive)

Property.Name: ATTACHMENT_ID
Property.sap:label: Attachment ID
Property.sap:quickinfo: Unique identifier of the attachment record

Property.Name: REQUEST_NO
Property.sap:label: Request Number
Property.sap:quickinfo: Internal request identifier for which the approval log is recorded

Property.Name: APPROVAL_LEVEL
Property.sap:label: Approval Level
Property.sap:quickinfo: Numeric level of the approval step in the workflow

Property.Name: APPROVER_ID
Property.sap:label: Approver ID
Property.sap:quickinfo: Unique identifier of the approver (e.g., user ID or employee ID)

Property.Name: APPROVER_ROLE
Property.sap:label: Approver Role
Property.sap:quickinfo: Role of the approver in the approval process

Property.Name: ACTION
Property.sap:quickinfo: Action taken by the approver (e.g., Approved, Rejected, Forwarded)

Property.Name: COMMENT
Property.sap:quickinfo: Remarks or notes provided by the approver

Property.Name: TIMESTAMP
Property.sap:quickinfo: Date and time when the action was performed

Property.Name: S4Response
Property.sap:label: S/4HANA Response
Property.sap:quickinfo: Response message returned from the S/4HANA system

Property.Name: S4ErrorMessage
Property.sap:label: S/4HANA Error Message
Property.sap:quickinfo: Error message from S/4HANA in case of failure

Property.Name: UPDATED_ON
Property.sap:label: Updated On
Property.sap:quickinfo: Timestamp when the approval log was last updated
